Articles.Content: What if a new game mode was added (like campaign and sandbox mode) where you are given a certain amount of money to start off, and you have to do the best you can to make money (like selling kethane, etc.). You would also need to build the ships and add a new "storage" building where the ships stay until you need to fly them, and once your money reaches zero and you have no missions running or any ships in storage, it's game over for you. Would this be good though?

So, careermode?

Not really, but sort of. There would probably be no definitive missions for you to do, just a payout for certain things (like orbiting kerbin, landing on mun, etc.).

(Sorry if this seems like career mode, I haven't really played career mode that much.)
